<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/leaveworld`**

**quick ref:**
> /leaveworld [-f]

**description:**

```
leaving the world and back to login screen.
@param [-f]: whether to force leave without saving
examples:
/leaveworld -f		:force leaving. 
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
离开这个世界,回到登录界面。
